definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: The radiation response of 375 ℃ thermoluminescence(TL) peak can be changed.
sentences.chinese: 石英375℃熱釋光峯存在靈敏度的變化。

sentences.english: The basic characteristic of 120 ℃ thermoluminescence peak of iceland spar was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對冰洲石120℃熱釋光峯的基本特性進行初步研究。

sentences.english: The radiographic dose on skin was measured with TSD.
sentences.chinese: 熱釋光劑量儀測試皮膚入射劑量。

sentences.english: The thermoluminescence strengths and peak temperatures of beryls can be regarded as the typomorphic characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 綠柱石的熱釋光強度和峯溫可作爲其標型特徵之一。

sentences.english: The quality control of thermoluminescence dosimetry is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了熱釋光劑量測量的質量控制問題。

sentences.english: Thermoluminescent detector(TLD)is a new solid state dose meter.
sentences.chinese: 熱釋光劑量計是一種新型的固體劑量計。

sentences.english: However, solid state dosimetry with thermoluminescent materials is also included .
sentences.chinese: 然而，也論及使用熱釋光材料的固體劑量學。

sentences.english: However, solid state dosimetry with thermoluminescent materials is also included.
sentences.chinese: 然而，也論及使用熱釋光材料的固體劑量學。

sentences.english: The radiographic dose on skin was measured with tested.
sentences.chinese: 熱釋光劑量儀測試皮膚入射劑量。

sentences.english: A review on the thermoluminescence dating is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文評述了熱釋光斷代的近況。

sentences.english: It has the Thermo Luminescence and Optical Luminescence for the different stimulated ways.
sentences.chinese: 由於激發方式的不同而有熱釋光與光釋光之分。
